frontmatter.description: Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris wrap up the first season of Osmosis with an outlook on what is still to come. We reflect on the first season and highlight future plans.
frontmatter.title: Wrapping up season one of the Osmosis podcast

frontmatter.description: In Episode 005 of OSMOSISCAST, Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris delve into the latest discoveries from DESI, shedding light on dark energy's mysteries.
frontmatter.title: Shedding Light on Dark Energy - Exploring DESI's Latest Discoveries!

frontmatter.description: Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris continue Osmosis, we unveil the cutting-edge technology of AdaIR and its transformative impact on noise removal in images.
frontmatter.title: Clearing the Picture - Exploring AdaIR for Noise Removal in Diverse Applications

frontmatter.description: In episode 003 of OSMOSISCAST, Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris embark on a journey through the annals of atomic history as we delve into the mysteries of plutonium, fission, and the haunting legend of the Demon Core.
frontmatter.title: Exploring Plutonium, Fission, and the Chilling Tale of the Demon Core! ‚ò¢Ô∏èüìú
